cause.description:
M.A. Rousseau invites you to participate in the "Keep the Internet Tax Free!"
Pledge Campaign at YouChoose.net.
YouChoose.net is a community of passionate individuals who create and participate in Pledge Campaigns that empower them to accomplish common goals.
The details of the Keep the Internet Tax Free! Pledge Campaign can be viewed at YouChoose.net.
It is free to participate in Pledge Campaigns at YouChoose.
We look forward to your participation at YouChoose.
Thank You.
M.A. Rousseau & YouChoose.net Community
1. Access to internet must remain TAX FREE
cause.mission:
NO CHARGES to use internet Worlwide
Congress is debating the future of the Internet.
The bad news is that the laws that keep Internet access tax-free will EXPIRE NOVEMBER 2007.
cause.name: Keep the Internet Tax Free
